#Text=West Kelowna
#Text=West Kelowna is a city of about 33,000 people ( 2016 ) in the Okanagan region of British Columbia .
#Text=It is the fourth largest community in the valley and home to some of its best known wineries , including Mission Hill , Mount Boucherie and Quail 's Gate .
#Text=Understand
#Text=Located on the west side of Okanagan Lake this stunning community offers everything a vacationing heart desires .
#Text=Lush trellised vineyards , mountain biking trails , hiking paths , skiing , beaches and spas - there are enough activities here to keep you busy all year round .
#Text=Prior to incorporation in 2007 , West Kelowna was commonly known as Westbank .
#Text=The municipality is home to more than 25,000 people who call this beautiful , safe and healthy community their home .
#Text=While the business sector is nurtured and growing its history and past is not forgotten .
#Text=Pride in the community 's deep agricultural roots continues today with row upon row of orchards and vineyards and even the country 's first nut farm .

#Text=West Kelowna is proud of its community neighbours and in particular the relationship that the community has with the Westbank First Nation , one of Canada 's most progressive First Nation Bands .
#Text=Economic growth and prosperity for the area is a result of this strong relationship .
#Text=Whether you visit during the hot summers or the power ridden winters , there is a little something for everyone !
#Text=Get in
#Text=Most travellers will arrive to Westbank/West Kelowna by car .
#Text=Highway 97 is the major highway through the community with Kelowna & Vernon to the north and Peachland , Summerland and Penticton to the south .
#Text=Highway 97C ( the Coquihalla Connector ) also offers access to the community , which is the route most people from Vancouver travel .
#Text=The Kelowna International Airport is a 25-minute drive away with daily service to several cities including Vancouver , Calgary , Edmonton , Seattle , Toronto , as well as Victoria .
#Text=There is no train service available .
#Text=Westbank/West Kelowna is part of a regional public transportation service .
#Text=There are several boat launches along the lakeshore with parking facilities and they can get quite busy in the summer months .
#Text=Get around
#Text=Kelowna Regional Transit System operates several routes in West Kelowna , including Route 97 , which goes to Kelowna seven days a week .
#Text=$ 2.50 cash fare ( 2018 ) .
#Text=Wineries
#Text=Gentle winding roads , lush orchards , ripe vineyards and spectacular views will take you away to your wine tasting adventures .
#Text=West Kelowna is proud to have seven wineries within its boundaries , with all offering a unique flavour and experience .

#Text=From a winery that adorns a hilltop with mission style architecture and bells , to small farmgate organic wineries as well as the most photographed vineyard in the Okanagan , you are sure to find the perfect bottle of wine here .
#Text=With an additional 22 wineries within a half hour drive , if wine touring is your thing , the area offers the perfect central location for a wine touring vacation .
#Text=Beaumont Family Estate Winery - 2775 Boucherie Rd
#Text=Kalala Organic Vineyards - 1361 Glencoe Rd
#Text=Little Straw Vineyards - 2815 Ourtoland Rd
#Text=Mission Hill Family Estate Winery , 829 Douglas Rd ( follow Boucherie Road for 5 km and turn right onto Mission Hill Road , and follow it to the top of the hill ) , ☏ +1 250-768-7611 .
#Text=Tours - May-Jun : daily 10AM-6PM , Jul-Aug : daily 10AM-8PM , Sep : daily 10AM-6PM , Oct-Apr : daily 11AM-6PM ( call to reserve ) .
#Text=Mount Boucherie Estate Winery - 829 Boucherie Rd
#Text=Quails 's Gate Estate Winery - 3303 Boucherie Rd
#Text=Rollingdale Winery - 2306 Hayman Rd
#Text=Do
#Text=Mt . Boucherie .
#Text=A focal point of the community and an extinct volcano .
#Text=Explore some of the trails while on the lookout for ancient lava river beds .
#Text=Buy
#Text=Westbank Towne Centre , 2475 Dobbin Rd , ☏ +1 403-259-3572 .
#Text=Daily 8AM-10PM , store hours vary .
#Text=About 20 stores including Save-On Foods , BC Liquor Store , and Starbucks .
#Text=Westridge Shopping Centre , 2484 Main St , ☏ +1 250-717-3000 .
#Text=In downtown West Kelowna at Highway 97 and Elliot Road ( off Main Street ) .
#Text=The Westbank Farmers ’ Market is held here each summer .
#Text=Anchored by Lordco , Pharmasave , and the Okanagan Regional Library .
#Text=New Moon Gallery , 1726 Byland Rd , ☏ +1 250-768-6618 .
#Text=M - F 10AM-5PM , Sa 10AM-4PM .
#Text=A gallery of original artwork and a working studio .
#Text=Paintings , photography , sculptures in soapstone and alabaster , wood turned bowls , pottery and jewellery .
#Text=Eat
#Text=Kekuli Cafe Westbank , 307-3550 Carrington Rd , ☏ +1 250-768-3555 .
#Text=M - F 8AM-4PM , Sa Su 9AM-4PM .
#Text=A locally owned Aboriginal cuisine cafe coffee shop , serving everything on bannock or with bannock ( fried bread ) .
#Text=Breakfast served all day , lunch & dinner .
#Text=“ Do n’t panic … they have bannock ! ”
#Text=Terrace Restaurant ( at the Mission Hill Winery ) , ☏ +1 250-768-6467 , ✉ terrace@missionhillwinery.com .
#Text=Overlooking rows of Pinot Noir & Chardonnay set against the Okanagan Lake , this outdoor serves cuisine that is locally , sustainably , and seasonally sourced .
#Text=Sustainable and bio-dynamic agricultural practices , including local foraging , organic farming , and the Vancouver Aquarium 's OceanWise program .
#Text=Open mid-May to Sep .
#Text=Krasna Indian Cuisine , 117-3640 Gosset Road , ☏ +1 778-754-0236 .
#Text=Tu - F 11:30AM-1:30PM 4:30PM-9PM ; Sa Su 4:30PM-9PM .
#Text=Authentic Indian cuisine ( Asian , not the other kind - for that you want Kekuli , above ) .
#Text=Mains $ 12 - 15.
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Super 8 West Kelowna BC , 1655 Westgate Rd , ☏ +1 250-769-2355 .
#Text=Free continental breakfast buffet , free Wi-Fi Internet access , in-room coffee and tea , indoor pool , hot tub , and fitness room .
#Text=From $ 93 .
#Text=Best Western Plus Wine Country Hotel & Suites , 3460 Carrington Rd , toll-free : +1-855-426-0336 .
#Text=Pet-friendly hotel , 24-hour fitness centre , business centre , waterslide , indoor pool and jetted hot tub .
#Text=From $ 180 .
#Text=Holiday Inn West Kelowna , 2569 Dobbin Rd , Hwy 97 , toll-free : +1-877-859-5095 .

#Text=Indoor/outdoor saltwater swimming pool , hot tub , fitness centre , free high-speed wireless Internet access , Business Centre , GK ’s Restaurant & Lounge , room service , meeting/event rooms , in-house catering & free parking .
#Text=From $ 139 .
#Text=The Cove Lakeside Resort , 4205 Gellatly Rd , Westbank , ☏ +1 250-707-1800 , toll-free : +1-877-762-2683 , fax : +1 250-707-1809 .
#Text=Check-in : 4PM , check-out : 11AM .

#Text=A luxury all-suite resort with 100 one- , two- and three-bedroom condo-style suites , a spa , fitness centre , pet-friendly rooms , free parking and wi-fi , a private lakefront beach , two seasonal outdoor pools and a private marina .
#Text=Peaceful waterfront setting and dramatic views of Okanagan Lake .
#Text=From $ 180 .
